name: Today I
description:
My prompt this week: "flatgame" + (a piece of game box art)

I researched lots of flatgames, and felt that they are 2d walking sims. What if a flat game has branching narrative? Thus I made this. 

Unfortunately, you can only refresh the page to restart (but I would recommend not to, or you could only hear the first few seconds of music.)
